job_description:
Vice President, Government Partnerships

About the Company

Innovative educational crowdfunding platform

Industry
Primary/Secondary Education

Type
Educational Institution

Founded
2000

Employees
201-500

Categories
• Non-Profit & Philanthropy
• Education
• Marketplace
• B2C
• Charity
• Humanitarian
• Non Profit
• Grantmaking
• Fundraising
• Advocacy Group
• Primary & Secondary Education
• Financial Support
• Support
• Community

About the Role

The Vice President, Government Partnerships will be responsible for overseeing a robust multi-year strategy to broaden the organization's government partnerships portfolio, identifying new partnership opportunities, and implementing the government funding strategy.

Hiring Manager Title
Chief Revenue and Marketing Officer

Travel Percent
30%

Functions
• Business Development

Known Requirements
• Bachelor's or master's degree in the relevant field required
• At least 10 years' experience in a comparable role required
• Superb leadership skills and at least 5 years' experience in fundraising and partnerships required
• Exceptional strategic thinking skills and proven ability to build and drive growth required

Qualifications: Bachelor's or master's degree in the relevant field required
At least 10 years' experience in a comparable role required
Superb leadership skills and at least 5 years' experience in fundraising and partnerships required
Exceptional strategic thinking skills and proven ability to build and drive growth required
Responsibilities: The Vice President, Government Partnerships will be responsible for overseeing a robust multi-year strategy to broaden the organization's government partnerships portfolio, identifying new partnership opportunities, and implementing the government funding strategy
